isis.stitle: SPICER 14 INCH (350 MM) SOLO CLUTCH - REMOVE - TWO PLATE CLUTCH ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install a spline alignment tool into the release bearing assembly and driven disc.

note.para: An old transmission input shaft may be used as a spline alignment tool.

step1.para: Install (4) 3/8" x 16 x 1-1/4" shipping bolts in the holes provided in the clutch cover and into the pressure plate to overcome the internal spring load. Tighten the bolts until they are snug.
Remove two clutch mounting bolts from the top position and install two guide studs to facilitate removal.
Loosen the remaining mounting bolts in a criss-cross pattern.
Remove the loose bolts and carefully slide the clutch off the two studs and spline aligning tool.
Remove the spline aligning tool and driven disc.
Re-install the alignment tool. Remove the intermediate plate/adapter ring assembly, the front driven disc and alignment tool.
